channel.title: Rune-Nation
channel.description:
Hello i am deciding to make my own 317 client/server/Website and i tried doing it alone ... Fail to the max
I am looking for at least one other person who is a good coder to help me code things that i can not. I'm very dedicated to my work and i have players but i am very picky when it comes to servers and i am not a leech so all my work turns into poop because i'm not very good. If anyone would like to assist me in my project please message. (-Note all profits will be controlled by me and 100% guarantied to only be used for server - VPS - Advertising - Website - Anything else to do with the server -)
My goal is not to make money but to just be a respectable server that everyone can enjoy. I have nothing else to do these days Because im only busy on weekends other then that i'm usually always doing stuff.
General run down:
I want to start with any client that has all the spirites...(emotion interface proper clan chat interface ect) Full barrows Full clan chat Full duel arena Only the important quests lol all bosses All items As little customs as possible ( as in items that do not exist in real RuneScape ) All minigames
Basically i want a server that is fun and enjoyable for everyone. I'm not into all that *skiller island* stuff because it makes it too easy i like creativescapes idea where you have to FIND everything yourself.
Message if interested
*note* I'm on a 4 gig 2009 vista computer that hosted for 30+ people so ill host until we can afford stuff YAY !

item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

ive coded most of my server myself i just need help with the hard shit im sory im not a nerd guys i really am maybe i should dedicate my life to flameing people and playing world of warcraft because thats the type of life i want. I want to be cool just like john459 and natey they are my new idol they bring a new definition to the 40 year old virgin i cant wait to be just like them because

Natey:

More like “Feel sorry for me people and COED MAI SERVR FOR ME LOL~~~~!!@!@~!@!1”

That is the funniest joke i have ever heard. I was Loling all day i still cant stoping PHEW u guys are killing me really guys calm down

If u dont understand sarcasm please go back to grade 3 english

stop flaming i dont have time for 50 year old men who pick on 17 year olds over the internet because u guys probabily have a bigger pussy then paris hilton so stop posting

item.title: Rune-Nation
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

see i never asked for donations people just randomly started and im dedicated to my work im working alone still so its tough but everyone seems to love it so far even though its shity and glitchey cuz i only know some stuff. Thanks for that little bit of support guys moparscape is packed with flamers so i love the good support i hope i can get far im gona work on my new project untill october thats my set deadline. Hopefully i can do alot with it in that time. Im trying to bring 317’s back to life

I love the 317 because even on a shit computer u can run it. My comp is lightning fast and i still need to save up for a good site and vps anyway ill edit post soon when i start my new project from a blank or very basic

Read full topic
